    All functions

    aceecostats aceecostats-package

    aceecostats.

    aes_files aes_chlfiles aes_sstfiles aes_icefiles

    The available remote sensing files at the time of bulk extraction.

    aes_maxdate aes_decades

    The key dates used for ACE ecostats assessment in the latest summary.

    aes_region aes_region_ll aes_region_simple

    Assessment regions for Southern Ocean ecosystems

    Season classifying

    aes_zone aes_zone_ll

    Assessment zones, simplified and made clear for Sector x Zone.

    aes_zone_cols()

    Habitat region colours

    alldecades

    All decades, used for interval classification

    build_bulk_file()

    File-backed raster file.

    calc_ice_season()

    actually calculate the ice season

    Classify raster cells by polygons

    Decade classification

    decselect()

    Pick a decade

    do_hist()

    Worker function for histogram/density

    Functions to read individual maps.

    readIceBrick()

    function to read a series of time slices, and interpolate a full sequence optionally

    readIceCache()

    Read ice cache function to read a series of time slices, and interpolate a full sequence of days this version of readIceBrick replaces it to get it from ice.grd
